core_meaning: Square between Mars and Neptune drives friction/work. Mars: drive, assertion, surgery, mechanics, conflict. Neptune: . General tenor: growth via friction; endurance and clear boundaries are key.

facets.career: Execution speed, competition, technical grit.  Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.relationships: Desire, boundaries, anger management.  Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.money: Risk-capital, decisive investments, initiative-led gains.  Emphasis: friction/work.
facets.health_adj: Inflammation, accidents; channel via training.  Emphasis: friction/work.

risk_notes: Friction escalating into conflict; respect pacing and boundaries.
Impulsive actions or accidents; channel energy into training.

applying: Prepare and initiate aligned actions; set intent and book resources. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Skill-up or pre-negotiate; clear blockers proactively. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
exact: Announce, pitch, launch, or sign; maximize visibility. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Make the decisive call; accept/decline offers consciously. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
separating: Consolidate gains, document learnings, adjust guardrails. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).
Close loops, stabilize routines, prune scope creep. (Mars: execute, train, assert; Neptune: act, iterate, measure; tone: friction/work).

dignity_adjustment.notes: Optional: adjust weights by sign/hse dignity e.g., exalt/debilitation.

retrograde_adjustment.notes: Optional: if either planet retrograde, temper extroversion; increase review loops.
